description:
It's raining gold coins! Come, play & catch them!

The skies have opened up but it’s not raining cats and dogs! It’s raining gold coins! Help poor Eve catch the gold coins and buy the toys she loves. Super addictive family game fun for kids, teenagers and grownups.

* Super cute graphics & characters.
* 4 worlds & 80 exciting rounds to play.
* Dress Eve up with skirts, costumes and accessories!
* Get help if you need it.
* Stereoscopic3D supported.
* Graphics change according to weather conditions
name: Raining Coins
